name: HKHeartRateSensorLocation
desc: Constants that indicate where on the body the heart rate sensor is located.

items.name: case other
items.desc: The heart rate sensor’s location is not otherwise on this list.

items.name: case chest
items.desc: The heart rate sensor is located on the user’s chest.

items.name: case wrist
items.desc: The heart rate sensor is located on the user’s wrist.

items.name: case finger
items.desc: The heart rate sensor is located on the user’s finger.

items.name: case hand
items.desc: The heart rate sensor is located on the user’s hand.

items.name: case earLobe
items.desc: The heart rate sensor is located on the user’s earlobe.

items.name: case foot
items.desc: The heart rate sensor is located on the user’s foot.
